api-endpoint.tooltip: The URL of your Shelly device's status endpoint e.g. http://192.168.1.1/rpc/Switch.GetStatus?id=0

refresh-interval.tooltip: How often to fetch data from the Shelly device

use-fahrenheit.tooltip: Show temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius

use-eu-format.description: Use European number format (1.234,56 instead of 1,234.56)

datetime-format.tooltip: Format string for the timestamp (e.g., %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S for full date and time)
